title: Clone of [https://www.starwars.com/]
description: This project is a clone of the official Star Wars website created using React. It utilizes styled-components for styling and leverages React hooks such as useState and useEffect for managing state and side effects.

title: Tabut WordPress Theme
description: Tabut is a user-friendly, modern, and responsive theme, built with most popular Bulma CSS with SEO in mind. Tabut is perfect for businesses, professional free-lancers, and creative individuals. Tabut comes with customizable theme options and a very appealing homepage design.
